description:
A 1H-sword technique.
The starter of any basic 1H-sword combo.
name: Slash

description:
A 1H-sword technique.
Slashes strongly at the foe.
name: Hard Cut

description:
A 1H-sword technique.
Slashes in a wide arc with the blade.
name: Wide Slash

description:
A 1H-sword technique.
Includes a swift lunge into a slash.
name: Lunging Rip

description:
A 1H-sword technique.
Uses the power of circles(!!!) to slash your foes.
name: Circle Blade

description:
A 1H-sword technique.
A lightning-fast slash that strikes numerous times.
name: Several Slash

description:
A 2H-sword technique.
The starter of any basic 2H-sword combo.
name: Gash

description:
A 2H-sword technique.
A wide, sweeping slash that easily hits many foes.
name: Sweeping Blade

description:
A 2H-sword technique.
A deliberate slash that is precisely 180 degrees like the half moon phase.
name: Half-moon Slash

description:
A 2H-sword technique.
A brutally powerful and destructive attack dealing heavy damage.
name: Brutality

description:
A 2H-spear technique.
The starter of any basic 2H-spear combo.
name: Thrust

description:
A 2H-spear technique.
A quick stabbing with the spear in-hand.
name: Quick Jab

description:
A 2H-spear technique.
A fairly long-ranged stabbing for those far-away foes.
name: Long Stab

description:
A 2H-spear technique.
Known for its destructivity, it penetrates multiple enemies multiple times.
name: Penetrator

description:
A 2H-spear technique.
A forceful and mighty thrust that doesn't care about no defense.
name: Forced Thrust

description:
A 2H-gun technique, for the mainhand.
The starter of any basic 2H-gun melee combo.
name: Snap

description:
A 2H-gun technique, for the mainhand.
A powerful melee strike with a sickening crack.
name: Crack

description:
A 2H-gun technique, for the mainhand.
A downward strike cements your victory over their face.
name: Plop

description:
Enhances \Skill[23].
Landing \Skill[23] now grants \State[43], temporarily upgrading \Skill[25] to \Skill[26].
name: Gun-fu

description:
A 2H-gun technique, for the offhand.
A standard gunshot with a bit of recoil.
name: Gunshot

description:
A 2H-gun technique, for the offhand.
An empowered gunshot with a bit of recoil.
name: Burst Shot

description:
A 2H-gun technique, for the mainhand.
Though it only fires one shot, it hits multiple times.
name: Scattershot

description:
A 1H-axe technique.
The starter of any basic 1H-axe combo.
name: Cleave

description:
A 1H-axe technique.
A fairly powerful swing with the heavy axe.
name: Heavy Swing

description:
A 1H-axe technique.
An extremely deadly swing that deals heavy damage.
name: Obliteration

description:
A 2H-axe technique.
The starter of any basic 2H-axe combo.
name: Rend

description:
A 2H-axe technique.
A quick horizontal slice like you're trying to behead your foes.
name: Behead

description:
A 2H-axe technique.
A powerful downward hacking slash attack that hits all nearby foes.
name: Crash Hack

description:
A 2H-axe technique.
A destructive wave emitted from swinging your axe at the speed of light.
name: Destroyer

description:
A 2H-axe technique.
A spinning attack that attacks all around the user.
name: Cyclone

description:
A 2H-axe technique.
A deadly forward slash that cuts down to the soul.
name: Annihilation

description:
A 2H-axe technique.
Embrace your inner berserker and eviscerate your foes with this attack.
name: Eviscerate

description:
A 1H-staff technique.
The starter of single-projectile 1H-staff combos.
name: Beam

description:
A 1H-staff technique.
A shot of magical energy that can hit an enemy multiple times.
name: Bounce

description:
A 1H-staff technique.
A burst of magical energy that can hit multiple enemies multiple times.
name: Burst

description:
A 1H-staff technique.
The starter of multi-projectile 1H-staff combos.
name: Spray

description:
A 1H-staff technique.
Fires a triad of magical energies that homes into the last target.
name: Barrage

description:
A offhand-tome technique.
The starter of this offHand-tome combo.
name: Pop

description:
A offhand-tome technique.
A spell that can strike multiple nearby targets around the foe.
name: Kapop

description:
A 1H-fist technique.
The starter of any 1H-fist combos.
name: Punch

description:
A 1H-fist technique.
A quick slap after the initial punch.
name: Slap

description:
A 1H-fist technique.
The old one-two follow-up to the slap.
name: Doubleslap

description:
A 1H-fist technique.
A solid and straight punch to the jaw (of most foes).
name: Straight Punch

description:
A 1H-fist technique.
A wild full-arm lariat, to follow-up to the straightest punch.
name: Lariat

description:
A 1H-fist technique.
Entering flow consumes TP, but enables rapid punches to grind your foes to dust.
name: Flow

description: Damage reduction: -33%. Precision parrying: 6 frames.
name: Guard (-33%)

description: Damage reduction: -20. Precision parrying: 12 frames.
name: Deflect (-20)

description: Damage reduction: -33% then -20.
name: Brace (-33%/-20)

description:
Damage reduction: -25%. Precision parrying: 6 frames.
Retaliates when the guard is successful (excludes precision parrying).
name: Guard-Counter (-25%)

description:
Damage reduction: -10. Precision parrying: 8 frames.
Retaliates when the precision parry is successful.
name: Deflect-Counter (-10)

description:
Damage reduction: -40%.
Counterblazes when the guard is successful.
name: Guard-Blaze (-40%)

description:
Damage reduction: -33% then -40.
Retaliates when the guard is successful (excludes precision parrying).
name: Brace-Counter (-33%/-40)

description:
Damage reduction: -10. Precision parrying: 30 frames.
Self-inflicts a critical boost state when precise-parrying.
name: Deflect-Boost (-10)

description:
Nullifies incoming damage.
Has a guard-counter-gigashock.
name: Gigablock (-100%)

description:
Deals a small amount of non-elemental damage.
Triggered as a retaliation when guarding or precise-parrying.
name: Counterattack

description:
Sprays a triad of moderate damage fireballs infront of you.
Triggered as a retaliation when guarding.
name: Counterblaze

description:
Deals a small amount of heat-elemental damage to the attacker.
May burn(10%) with each hit.
name: Burning Body

description:
Deals a small amount of void-elemental damage to the attacker.
May exhaust(10%) with each hit.
name: Ghostly Body

description: Grants a momentary boost of crit and damage after a precise-parry.
name: Accelerate

description: Rapidly regenerates health in response to being struck.
name: Mitosis

description:
Heals a small amount and has a small chance of granting up to three buffs:
Shielder(33%), Healthy(33%), Wrath(33%).
name: Puff

description:
Deals a small amount of ground-elemental damage to the attacker.
Scales with attacker's health, grants a small bonus of TP.
name: Hard Spines

description:
Deals a small amount of non-elemental damage to the attacker.
Is especially effective against undead.
name: Silver Spines

description:
Deals a small amount of void-elemental damage and applies
\State[9], \State[10], and \State[11] to the attacker.
name: Void Spines

description:
Deals a moderate amount of non-elemental damage to the attacker.
Scales with attacker's health and your proficiency.
name: Otherworldy Spines

description: May apply a variety of puffs to all nearby allies.
name: Mecha-puff Device

description:
Recovers tech and increases all stats permanently.
Triggered as a retaliation.
name: Radiant Growth

description: Lunge forward at high speeds 2 spaces!
name: Lunge

description: Backstep quickly 2 spaces!
name: Backstep

description: Tumble in a designated direction 3 spaces!
name: Tumble

description:
Deals moderate air-elemental damage multiple times in a line.
Especially effective versus flying enemies.
name: Sonic Wave

description:
Enhances \Skill[101].
The wave now flies roughly 30% further and hits additional times.
name: Sonic Distance

description:
Enhances \Skill[101].
The wave can now land critical hits and has -20% cooldown.
name: Sonic Striker

description:
Enhances \Skill[101].
The damage formula now scales with skill proficiency.
name: Sonic Violence

description:
Enhances \Skill[101].
The wave now hits even more times, and has a -40% cooldown instead.
name: Sonic Speed

description:
Deals light ground-elemental damage numerous times to all enemies hit by the boulder.
Especially effective versus construct enemies.
name: Boulderdash

description:
Enhances \Skill[106].
The boulder now may stun(2%/hit) and has -20% cooldown.
name: Bouldercrush

description:
Enhances \Skill[106].
The boulder now hits more frequently and has -30% cooldown.
name: Boulderspikes

description:
Enhances \Skill[106].
\Skill[106] will now fire a W(3) of boulders infront of the caster.
name: Boulderbananza

description:
Enhances \Skill[106].
The boulders will now hit even more frequently and scales with proficiency.
name: Boulderdoom

description:
Launches multiple air-elemental arcs infront of you.
Especially effective versus Beasts.
name: V Blade

description:
Enhances \Skill[111].
The arcs now generate TP(+2 per hit) on hitting foes, and hits more times.
name: V for Vitality

description:
Enhances \Skill[111].
The arcs now may poison(10%/hit) targets and the formula multipliers are increased.
name: V for Virulent

description:
Enhances \Skill[111].
The arcs now may apply on-hit effects(50%) and can now crit.
name: V for Versatile

description:
Enhances \Skill[111].
\Skill[111] will now fire three arcs, generates more TP(+5 per hit), and hits more times.
name: V for Venerable

description:
Stomps the ground extremely hard to deal ground-element damage to all nearby foes.
Especially effective versus slime enemies. May unbalance(25%) any damaged foe.
name: Siesmic Stomp

description:
Enhances \Skill[116].
The stomp now generates vibrations that cause damage after the initial shock.
name: Angry Stomp

description:
Enhances \Skill[116].
The stomp damage radius is increased by 100%.
name: Deep Stomp

description:
Enhances \Skill[116].
The stomp is now a square hitbox and is more likely to unbalance(40%).
name: Geometric Stomp

description:
Enhances \Skill[116].
The stomp's cooldown is greatly reduced (-50%) and now reduces foes defenses(-33%).
name: Deliberate Stomp

description:
Fires a twist into the air that spirals and absorbs energy from foes it touches.
Especially effective versus enemies with an aura.
name: Vacuum Twist

description:
Enhances \Skill[121].
The twist now lasts 50% longer (+1s) and hits more times.
name: Twist Plus

description:
Enhances \Skill[121].
The damage formula has increased multipliers and can now crit.
name: Twist Force

description:
Enhances \Skill[121].
The twist now hits more frequently and may inflict disabled(25%/hit).
name: Twist Betwixt

description:
Enhances \Skill[121].
Now fires off a cross(4) of twists that now all generate TP(+1/hit).
name: Twist Cross

description:
Fires an large chunk of earth straight ahead dealing moderate earth damage.
Especially effective versus Insects.
name: Geo Shot

description:
Enhances \Skill[126].
The shot now has -20% cooldown and generates TP (+1/hit).
name: Quick Shot

description:
Enhances \Skill[126].
The shot now has -40% cooldown and is also effective against aquatic foes.
name: Hook Shot

description:
Enhances \Skill[126].
The shot now has -60% cooldown and may inflict guardless(33%/hit).
name: Shatter Shot

description:
Enhances \Skill[126].
The shot now has -80% cooldown, can crit, and scales with proficiency.
name: Deadly Shot

description:
Take a moment to just breathe and focus on the raw air elemental energy around you.
Heals and grants \State[24], bolstering various combat stats.
name: Breathe

description:
Enhances \Skill[131].
The breath also grants \State[25].
name: Zen Breath

description:
Enhances \Skill[131].
The breath also grants \State[26].
name: Night Breath

description:
Enhances \Skill[131].
The breath also grants \State[27].
name: Sake Breath

description:
Enhances \Skill[131].
The breath also grants \State[28].
name: Righteous Breath

description:
Conjures a wild armor of earth that is rippling with spines.
Grants \State[29], bolstering various defensive stats.
name: Earthen Armor

description:
Enhances \Skill[136].
The armor also grants \State[30].
name: Rock Spines

description:
Enhances \Skill[136].
The breath also grants \State[31].
name: Metallic Spines

description:
Enhances \Skill[136].
The breath also grants \State[32].
name: Hollow Spines

description:
Enhances \Skill[136].
The breath also grants \State[33].
name: Star Spines

description:
Why try when you could just not try?
Absolute annihilation in all directions.
name: Megashock

description:
Sprays a wave of unfiltered space-time-absorbing energy in
a direction. Obliterates everything in its path.
name: Gigashock

description:
Why try when you could just not try?
Absolute annihilation in all directions.
name: Omnishock

description:
Your standard in fiery damage fare- deals moderate heat elemental damage.
Fires a single ball of flame straight ahead.
name: Fireball

description:
Enhances \Skill[151].
The hitbox of the fireball is increased and hits all targets available.
name: Bulbous Ball

description:
Enhances \Skill[151].
May apply \State[34](50%) increasing incoming heat damage, and hit times increased.
name: Vengeful Flames

description:
Enhances \Skill[151].
The fireball is even bigger, and the damage formula scales with proficiency.
name: Massive Ball

description:
Enhances \Skill[151].
The fireball now has -50% cooldown, and may self-apply \State[42](25%) on-cast.
name: Pyromaniac

description:
Deals a small amount of fire-elemental damage per fireball.
Shoots a nova(8) of fireballs all around the caster.
name: Nova

description:
Enhances \Skill[156].
Each novalette now hits more times and reaches about 33% further.
name: Full Nova

description:
Enhances \Skill[156].
Each novalette may inflict \State[4](33%) and generates more TP(+3/hit).
name: Static Nova

description:
Enhances \Skill[156].
Each novalette now has knockback and has increased damage.
name: Force Nova

description:
Enhances \Skill[156].
Each novalette may inflict \State[34](33%).
name: Vengeful Nova

description:
Spews forth flame like a dragon, dealing light heat-elemental damage repeatedly.
May inflict \State[36](50%) to any damaged foes, causing increased vulnerability to heat damage.
name: Dragon Breath

description:
Enhances \Skill[161].
The breath may also inflict \State[37](50%) and has -20% cooldown.
name: Rancid Breath

description:
Enhances \Skill[161].
The breath now scales with proficiency and now may crit.
name: Skillful Breath

description:
Enhances \Skill[161].
The breath now hits more frequently and generates more TP(+2/hit).
name: Blasting Breath

description:
Enhances \Skill[161].
\Skill[161] will now fire a trio of breaths infront of the caster.
name: Spreading Breath

description:
A very fast whip of extremely hot flames dealing large amounts of heat elemental damage in a line.
Very strong, but have to be in close proximity to land the blow.
name: Lava Whip

description:
Enhances \Skill[166].
The whip now generates TP(+4/hit) and hits more times.
name: Bouncy Coil

description:
Enhances \Skill[166].
The whip is now especially effective versus shielded foes.
name: Segmented Coil

description:
Enhances \Skill[166].
The whip has a longer range and may stun(5%/hit) the target.
name: Extended Coil

description:
Enhances \Skill[166].
The damage multipliers are greatly increased and scales with proficiency.
name: Power Coil

description:
Reach forth into the depths of the abyss to understand the true meaning of flame.
Grants \State[38], bestowing bonus force to the caster.
name: Molten Wisdom

description:
Enhances \Skill[171].
The wisdom now grants \State[39] which increases force more.
name: Mysticism

description:
Enhances \Skill[171].
The wisdom now has -20% cooldown.
name: Quick-witted

description:
Enhances \Skill[171].
The wisdom now applies \State[40] and increases force even further.
name: Blazing Inversion

description:
Enhances \Skill[171].
The wisdom now applies \State[41] and increases force even further.
name: Explosive Inversion

description:
Shoots a single fireball dealing light heat-elemental damage.
Due to low elemental requirements, this can be cast in rapid succession.
name: Rapid Cinders

description:
Enhances \Skill[176].
\Skill[176] now launches a V(2) when casted.
name: Bifurcating Cinders

description:
Enhances \Skill[176].
The cinders now generate TP(+3/hit) and hits more often.
name: Bursting Cinders

description:
Enhances \Skill[176].
The cinders may inflict \State[36](10%), scales with skill proficiency, and scales with target's current health..
name: Dragon Cinders

description:
Enhances \Skill[176].
\Skill[176] now launches a W(3) when casted and hits more often.
name: Trifurcating Cinders

description:
Generates a "sun" on the field derived from pure elemental energy.
Heals all allies in the vicinity of the "sun" with every pulse.
name: Sun's Touch

description:
Enhances \Skill[181].
The sun's pulse now has 33% increased range, and also heals TP(+15/pulse).
name: Radiant Sun

description:
Enhances \Skill[181].
The sun's pulse now may revive the dead(50%).
name: Glorious Sun

description:
Enhances \Skill[181].
The sun's pulse will now follow the party.
name: Loving sun

description:
Enhances \Skill[181].
\Skill[181]'s healing now scales with skill proficiency and has -20% cooldown.
name: Sage's Sun

description:
Flames erupt from all around you, dealing moderate heat-elemental damage to all nearby foes.
Especially effective versus shielded enemies.
name: Eruption

description:
Enhances \Skill[186].
The flame's range is increased by 20% and generates TP(+10/hit)
name: Irruption

description:
Enhances \Skill[186].
The flames now cause additional MP damage.
name: Corruption

description:
Enhances \Skill[186].
The flames now hit more times and may inflict \State[36](50%).
name: Disruption

description:
Enhances \Skill[186].
The flames now scale with skill proficiency and hit more times.
name: Leyruption

description:
Applies \State[44] to self and reduces own aggro by 500.
Restores 100 + 10% MP immediately, and another 30% over 10 seconds.
name: Liquijuvenation

description:
Enhances \Skill[191].
The recovery is now 500 + 25% immediately and reduces aggro by 1000 instead.
name: Energizing Waters

description:
Enhances \Skill[191].
The waters now apply \State[45], reducing generated aggro(-50%) for the duration of this state.
name: Hallowed Waters

description:
A standard basic attack.
Deals light physical damage, applies \State[1], and can crit.
name: Attack

description:
Enhances \Skill[201].
Increases distance traveled by +300%.
name: +Ranged

description:
Enhances \Skill[201].
Damage formula now leans towards a magical focus.
name: +Magical

description:
Enhances \Skill[201].
Heals the caster for 100% of the damage dealt.
name: +Absorb

description:
Enhances \Skill[201].
Defender cannot elementally resist the attack.
name: +True

description:
Enhances \Skill[201].
Increases projectile count to 3.
name: +Spraying

description:
Enhances \Skill[201].
Increases knockback by 3 and hit times by +1.
name: +Forceful

description:
Enhances \Skill[201].
Updates the projectile to home into the target.
name: +Homing

description:
A weak fireball from a trap.
Deals (30 - MDF) damage.
name: Fireball Trap

description:
A big and angry heavy blow like from a bear or something.
May stun(33%) and bleed(66%).
name: Heavy Blow

description:
Deals light liquid-element damage because kappa's slaps are offensive.
May mute(66%) and disable(66%).
name: Kappa Slap

description:
Bites a single target.
Deals a light amount of poke damage.
name: Bite

description:
Flaps wings to stir up quite a breeze!
Deals cut damage in a line and may stun(33%).
name: Wing Flap

description:
Fires an enormous-but-slow fireball straight ahead that cannot be parried.
Will likely burn(80%) and always seals(100%).
name: Willow's Flame

description:
A dangerously strong blow that deals heavy damage and knocks
the target way back.
name: Crackdown

description:
Touches your target with the hands of death.
Absorbs all damage dealt as life.
name: Death's Touch

description:
Seals the caster's ability to perform skills, but grants a
light life regeneration and a small boost in power and force.
name: Rage Growth

description:
Drains a small amount of Magi(50 + 10%).
May inflict disable(50%).
name: Jelluminance

description:
Smites the nearest foe directly with a sudden stone crush.
Always strikes the nearest target. May stun(20%).
name: Earth Crush

description:
Heals all allies nearby the caster for a small amount.
Grants "Fae-Regen I".
name: Faerie Heal

description:
A quick stab at the target that ignores a most of the target's defense.
May cause bleeding(40%).
name: Shank

description:
Throws sand in the eyes of a target which causes them to recoil.
Knocks all enemies nearby back a significant distance; may stun(50%).
name: Throw Sand

description:
A swift rake with possibly infected claws.
May inflict poison(33%) and bleeding(33%).
name: Slobber Slash

description:
Whips the target with their tongue to soften defenses and drain magi.
Likely to inflict Soften Endurance(80%) and Soften Resist(80%).
name: Tonguewhip

description:
Takes a bite out of the target.
Just deals a ton of damage and absorbs life from damage dealt.
name: Devour

description:
Fires off a barrage of stingers that may poison(~5x10%).
Deals light damage up to five times.
name: Infestation

description:
Slams the ground and generates a spume of literal void.
Pulse once per second for 5 seconds. May poison(30%).
name: Void Spiral

description: A liquid-elemental version of the Ranged Attack.
name: Water Shot

description:
A dangerous swing in an arc in front of you.
Deals moderate weapon damage scaling with the user's current health.
name: Ferocious Swing

description:
Attempts to liquify all living entities within reach.
Melts a target and absorbs that matter into itself.
name: Liquify

description:
Deals light ground damage and greatly reduces foe's defenses(-40%).
Absorbs damage dealt directly as life and may sap(50%).
name: Sap

description:
Empowers allies to become more aggressive.
While aggressive, allies have increased power and additional skills.
name: Command: Aggro

description:
An aggressive assault on the target.
May cause bleeding(33%).
name: Aggressive Assault

description:
Like a basic attack, but hits up to two times.
Both hits apply basic attack effects.
name: Twin Striker

description:
Launches a deadly blast that inflicts poison(100%) alongside basic attack effects.
May also stun(33%) due to the devastating impact of this skill.
name: Venomous Burst

description:
Fires a slow-moving skull that deals %-current health void-typed damage.
Each pulse knocks away the target from the caster.
name: Undying Pulse

description:
Throw a blob in a direction- especially effective against humanoids.
May cause damage and inflict forgetful(50%).
name: Brainfog

description:
Fires a beam of pure energy straight ahead.
Deals heavy energy damage many times to any targets hit.
name: Energy Beam

description:
Fires a beam of pure energy straight ahead.
Deals heavy energy damage many times to any targets hit.
name: Water Surge

description:
Increases all parameters by 33%.
Grants skill \Skill[228].
name: Second Phase

description:
Increases all parameters by 33%.
Grants skill \Skill[239].
name: Third Phase

description:
Heals all allies nearby the caster for a small amount.
May apply \State[72](50%).
name: Bloom

description:
Enhances \Skill[301].
The bloom may also apply \State[71] and has -25% cooldown.
name: Hardened Bloom

description:
Enhances \Skill[301].
The bloom may also apply \State[73] and has -50% cast time.
name: Angry Bloom

description:
Enhances \Skill[301].
The bloom always applies its puff effects, and has +200% increased range.
name: Certain Bloom

description:
Enhances \Skill[301].
The bloom now scales with proficiency, can crit, and has -50% cooldown.
name: Kabloom

description:
Creates an earthen shell around the caster that explodes.
Deals light ground damage to all foes near the caster.
name: Siesmic Shell

description:
Enhances \Skill[306].
The explosion applies \State[8] to enemies and has -50% reduced cast time.
name: Shocking Shell

description:
Enhances \Skill[306].
The explosion now fires off a cross(4) of shrapnel instead.
name: Shrapnel Shell

description:
Enhances \Skill[306].
The shell will knockback targets and is extra effective against constructs.
name: Blast Shell

description:
Enhances \Skill[306].
The damage now scales with proficiency, can crit, and fires a nova(8) of shrapnel.
name: Ancient Shell

description:
Applies \State[46] to a nearby ally.
\State[46] increase power and force by +50%.
name: Overgrowth

description:
Enhances \Skill[311].
The growth also applies \State[47], boosting speed and luck.
name: Hasty Growth

description:
Enhances \Skill[311].
The growth now has increased range and can apply to multiple allies.
name: Rampant Growth

description:
Enhances \Skill[311].
The growth also applies \State[48], boosting life and magi.
name: Giant's Growth

description:
Enhances \Skill[311].
The growth also applies \State[49], increasing all growth effects by an additional +50%.
name: Limitless Growth

description:
Strikes a nearby foe and all foes surrounding the target with a
devastating spire of pure earthen elemental energy.
name: Earthen Force

description:
Enhances \Skill[316].
The force is now extra effective against constructs and hits more times.
name: Destructive Force

description:
Enhances \Skill[316].
The force may apply \State[50](33%), giving foes the chance(25%) to apply various puffs to you on-hit.
name: Blooming Force

description:
Enhances \Skill[316].
The force now generates TP(+10/hit/target) and applies \State[50] to self on cast.
name: Invigorating Force

description:
Enhances \Skill[316].
The force is also effective against deities, cannot be parried, scales with proficiency and can crit.
name: Deific Force

description: Fires a slow-moving lob of water that barrels through foes.
name: Riptide

description:
Enhances \Skill[321].
The riptide now fires a W(3) of water lobs that may inflict \State[52](10%/hit).
name: Surging Riptide

description:
Enhances \Skill[321].
The riptide now hits more frequently and generates TP(+2/hit/target).
name: Raging Riptide

description:
Enhances \Skill[321].
The riptide now fires a nova(8) and applies \State[53].
name: Flooding Riptide

description:
Enhances \Skill[321].
The surge no longer has a cooldown after use and hits more frequently.
name: Reflexive Surge

description:
A swift strike with a watery whip.
Deals heavy water damage to targets infront of the caster.
name: Watery Strike

description:
Enhances \Skill[326].
The strike may apply \State[20](50%).
name: Sealing Strike

description:
Enhances \Skill[326].
The strike applies \State[54] to self when casted, empowering all outgoing liquid damage.
name: Inspiring Strike

description:
Enhances \Skill[326].
The strike knocks foes back, and may apply \State[23](50%).
name: Crushing Strike

description:
Enhances \Skill[326].
The strike now scales with proficiency and ignores magic defenses equal to ones' own.
name: Penetrating Strike

description:
Summons a geyser that spews water at any foes nearby.
Deals light liquid damage at most a few times before dissipating.
name: Water Spume

description:
Enhances \Skill[331].
The spume may apply \State[5](50%/hit).
name: Spume of Lockdown

description:
Enhances \Skill[331].
The spume now knocks foes back and has -30% cast time.
name: Spume of Force

description:
Enhances \Skill[331].
The spume now heals the caster for all damage dealt, and scales with proficiency.
name: Spume of Sustainance

description:
Enhances \Skill[331].
The spume has +300% range, +100% duration, and pulses more frequently.
name: Spume of Mastery

description:
Launches a beam of pure liquid energy straight ahead.
Deals severe liquid damage to all enemies in the line of fire.
name: Liquid Force

description:
Enhances \Skill[336].
The force now applies /State[55] and generates TP(+3/hit/target).
name: Rising Force

description:
Enhances \Skill[336].
The force now knocks foes back and scales with proficiency.
name: Forceful Force

description:
Enhances \Skill[336]. The force can now inflict one or more of a variety of ailments:
\State[4], \State[5], \State[6], \State[7], and/or \State[8], at (10%/hit/target/ailment).
name: Debilitating Force

description:
Enhances \Skill[336].
The force now has -50% reduced cooldown/cast time, and also inflicts \State[57] on foes.
name: Oceanic Force

description: Mercilessly destroys otherwise-overly-durable rocks and spires.
name: Ukelele

description:
Blows up after five seconds.
Will destroy destructables near it, and damage foes.
name: Time Bomb

description:
Light those pesky puzzle torches that obviously can't
be lit by \N[2]'s fire spells for some stupid reason.
name: Red Wand

description:
Can overload nearby electronic devices and systems.
May inflict stun(33%) and/or paralysis(33%) if used on enemies.
name: Voltage Baton
==SUPERLATIVES======
note:
"Combat Passives"
While a battler knows these skills, all
listed states will be permanently affecting
said battler. These states cannot stack,
which means they cannot be re-applied from
any other sources while the battler has
this skill learnt.

description:
dealt void dmg+20%
received void dmg-20%
name: Veritable Gloom

description:
immunity to root
EXP+10%
name: Undying Pride

description: retaliate
name: Bone to Pick

name: Lochness Wrath

description: sin
name: Slime of Sloth

description: sin
name: Green with Envy

name: Lupine Gluttony

description: sin
name: Hive Mind Acedia

name: Humanity's Greed

retaliate
immunity to paralysis
name: Zap Plating

description: sin
name: Cybernetic Lust

description: PDR, MDR, Tp regen, states last longer
name: Vibrivium Pulsar

name: Deitatem

name: Godlike Vainglory
